issue.title: [CF 401] A lua error

> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl | Imported from CurseForge issue #401 | Raw

comments.body:
Attachment Added: TellMeWhen.lua

TellMeWhen.lua


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

That is very, very strange....

I know what was happening, and I fixed it, but I don't know why it was happening in the first place. Oh well...


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
